name: rates
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currencyapi_net.
Tool description: Real-time currency conversion on 152 currencies and cryptos
API description: Fetches live currency conversion rates based on the specified parameters.

output.description: The output format of the response. Can be either 'JSON' or 'XML'. Default is 'JSON'.

base.description: The base currency for conversion rates. Examples include 'USD', 'GBP', or 'BTC'. Default is 'USD'.
